articles.author: Marisa Schultz
articles.title: Rep. Kevin Brady lays into May jobs report, says Biden's policies holding America back - Fox Business
articles.description: Texas Rep. Kevin Brady Friday blasted the May jobs report for "falling-well short of expectations" and blamed President Biden's policies for an economic outlook that "mirrors the stagnant 1970s."
